name: youtubeMe Earth Hour V3 new style
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document domain("youtube.com"),domain("plus.googleapis.com"),domain("apis.google.com")

/*                        youtubeMe Earth Hour V3                            */
/*                  http://userstyles.org/users/124747                    */
/*  author: rank9                                                                  */
/* contact: monokingdom.admin@gmail.com                           */

{

body,
.yt-subscription-button.yt-subscription-button-js-default.subscribed.yt-uix-button.yt-uix-button-default.yt-uix-hovercard-target,
.yt-uix-expander-collapsed.yt-uix-button.yt-uix-button-default,
.search-form.consolidated-form,
#watch-context,#watch-mfu-button,.yt-uix-button,#watch-description-expand,
.yt-uix-form-textarea.comments-textarea,
#masthead-search-term,
#feed,
.yt-tile-static,
.playlist-bar-item,
#watch-context-body,
.context-link,
#playlist-bar-bar,
#watch-video-annotation,
#watch-video-annotation-textarea,
#watch-description-collapse,
#masthead-container,
.branded-page-v2-secondary-col,
.yt-thumb-clip-inner,
.branded-page-v2-col-container,
.yt-grid-box.yt-masthead-hh,
.feed-item-container:hover,
#footer-hh-container,
.feed-author-bubble,
.yt-subscription-button-subscriber-count-unbranded-vertical,
#watch7-discussion,
#watch7-action-panel-footer,
.yt-uix-button-panel,
#watch7-headline,
#watch7-user-header,
.overlay,
.html5-player-chrome.html5-stop-propagation,
#guide-container,
#watch7-sidebar,
#watch7-video,
.lohp-large-shelf-container,
.lohp-vbox-list lohp-left-vbox-list,
#yt-masthead-container,
#channel-subscription-promo-in-feed,
#footer-container,
#yt-picker-language-footer,
#yt-picker-country-footer,
#yt-picker-safetymode-footer,
#masthead-expanded,
#masthead-expanded-container,
.yt-uix-contextlink.yt-uix-sessionlink,
#watch-discussion,
.ytg-fl,
.social-connector,
.yt-uix-form-input-select,
.starting-box,
#upload-button-menu,
#dashboard-header,
.lohp-medium-shelves-container,.lohp-vbox-list.lohp-left-vbox-list,.lohp-vbox-list.lohp-right-vbox-list,.lohp-newspaper-shelf,.context-data-container
,.branded-page-v2-primary-col
,.lohp-shelf-cell-container.lohp-category-shelf:hover
,#player,#watch7-branded-banner,#content,#watch7-container,#guide-container
,.filter-top,.yt-lockup2.yt-lockup2-video.yt-uix-tile.context-data-item.clearfix:hover
,td

/*New Comment iframe*/
,.comments-iframe-container,.yJa,.Mza.mj,.uPa.BJa,.dga,.d-s.L5.r0,.xPa.xN.d-y-r-c.d-k-l
,.d-r.d-r-Mn.Hma,.Mga,.Jea,.zVeWr,.DJa
/*-----------------------------*/
{background-image: url(http://i.imgur.com/NgIvX.png)!important;border: 0px !important;box-shadow: none !important;}

.yt-uix-form-input-textarea.comments-textarea.link-gplus-lightbox,.yt-uix-form-input-text,#description{background:#ccc;border: 10px !important;box-shadow: none !important;}
.yt-uix-form-input-checkbox-container.checked{background: #fff !important;height:16px !important;}
.yt-sidebar-link.yt-sidebar-selected,.creator-sidebar-item.selected,.yt-uix-form-input-text,.guide-item.yt-uix-sessionlink.guide-item-selected{background: #aaa !important;}

a,p{text-shadow:none;}

.d-A.Pga,.RN.Nza.E5,.Dwa.e4
{background-color:rgba(36, 36, 36 , 0.45) ;border: 0px !important;box-shadow: none !important;}
    
#watch-share
{box-shadow:none;color:rgb(255, 255, 255);text-shadow:0pt 1px 0pt rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);border:1px solid;}

.yt-grid-box.yt-masthead-hh,
.feed-item-container,
#watch7-action-buttons
,.feed-item-main
,.branded-page-v2-primary-col
,.lohp-shelf-cell-container.lohp-category-shelf
,.lohp-blog-headline
,.yt-horizontal-rule
,.primary-col
,.search-header
,.feed-header
{border: 0px !important;box-shadow: none !important;}

#yt-hitchhiker-feedback,
#homepage-sidebar-ads
{display:none}

a,.video-list-item .title, .yt-uix-pager .yt-uix-pager-selected, .yt-uix-expander-head,
#search-section-header .name, #search-related-terms .search-related-title,
#no-playlists, .browse-modifiers-extended .selected,
input, .fm-title-underlined-blue, .feedmodule-subnull-txt-header,
.iyt-edit-link, .groupnamecont.selected, .shmoovies-list-container #recent-column h4,
.shows-table .extra,#watch-tags span, .title-text-color, #playnav-curvideo-title, .feedmodule-smtitle,
.shmoovies-list-container h4, #show-content th,
#homepage-whats-new .module-title, .homepage-side-block .module-title,
#watch-owner-inline-edit #inline-edit-cancel, .ytg-4col h2, #categories-container .ytg-2col h2
,.title
    
/*New Comment iframe*/
,.comments-iframe-container,.yJa,.Mza.mj,.uPa.BJa,.dga,.d-s.L5.r0,.xPa.xN.d-y-r-c.d-k-l
,.d-r.d-r-Mn.Hma,.Mga,.Jea,.zVeWr,.DJa,.Ct
,.yt-uix-button-toggled,.yt-uix-tooltip,.gssb_a
/*-----------------------------*/
{color:#777 !important;}

#logo button{visibility: hidden !important;}
#logo, #smallMastheadLogo, .logo {background: url("http://i.imgur.com/WnMpl.png") no-repeat transparent !important;}
#signup-youtube-logo {background: url("http://i.imgur.com/WnMpl.png") no-repeat transparent !important; padding-left:84px !important; width: 0px !important;}
#footer-logo{background: url("http://i.imgur.com/WnMpl.png") no-repeat transparent !important; padding-left:84px !important; width: 0px !important;}

#eow-title
{color:#CCC;}
.comment-text,#eow-description,p,h3,li,h1,h2,h4,h5,h6
{color:#AAA;}

    #masthead-search-terms,.RN.Nza.E5{border-bottom:1px #ccc solid !important;}
    
}

@-moz-document url-prefix(http://), 
url-prefix(https://) {
 .kv8eNc,.gP{background:transparent !important;}
}
